QueryResult.text: SELECT CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS.ID AS PRID, CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS.NAME AS PRCAPTION, CMN_LOOKUPS.LOOKUP_ENUM AS PRVALUE, CMN_LOOKUPS.LOOKUP_TYPE AS PRNAME, CMN_LOOKUPS.SORT_ORDER FROM CMN_LOOKUPS,CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS WHERE CMN_LOOKUPS.ID = CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS.PK_ID AND CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS.TABLE_NAME='CMN_LOOKUPS'
